name: syncio
description: Syncio - Stremio addon and user management system

scripts.server:private:watch: cp prisma/schema.sqlite.prisma prisma/schema.prisma && npx prisma generate && QUIET=true DEBUG=false AUTH_ENABLED=false DATABASE_URL="file:./prisma/sqlite.db" REDIS_URL="redis://localhost:6379" JWT_SECRET="temp-jwt-secret-key" ENCRYPTION_KEY="temp-encryption-key-32-chars-long" nodemon server/database-backend.js
scripts.server:public:watch: cp prisma/schema.postgres.prisma prisma/schema.prisma && npx prisma generate && QUIET=true DEBUG=false AUTH_ENABLED=true DATABASE_URL="postgresql://syncio:syncio@localhost:5432/syncio" REDIS_URL="redis://localhost:6379" JWT_SECRET="temp-jwt-secret-key" ENCRYPTION_KEY="temp-encryption-key-32-chars-long" nodemon server/database-backend.js
scripts.client:dev:private: cd client && NEXT_PUBLIC_AUTH_ENABLED=false npm run dev
scripts.client:dev:public: cd client && NEXT_PUBLIC_AUTH_ENABLED=true npm run dev

author: Syncio Team
